Articles.Content:
Hello!

I docked two crafts in **stage mode** using HNIJKL keys for RCS control. Everything was OK.

Then I read wiki. [http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Docking](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Docking)

It says: 

> 
> Right click the docking port on your ship and hit "control from here". Now activate docking mode. What is happening now is that docking port will be seen as the "center" of your ship. Activate RCS (the default key isR) and the controls will be very similar to the EVA controls. WS will be used to move forward and backwards, AD will be used to move left and right, Ã¢â€¡Â§ Shift and ^ Ctrl will be used to move up and down.

But the game doesn't work this way!

W and S still pitch, A and D still yaw even though i'm in **docking mode.**

Shift and Control still control main engine in docking mode.

Space hotkey doesn't affect anything.

Is it a bug or am i missing something?

**KSP version:** 1.0.0.830 Steam version

Some screenshots:

Hitting W (It should move we forward, shouldn't it?)

![qIfMhKB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qIfMhKB.jpg)

Hitting A (Shouldn't this move ME left, but not turn left?)

![i6h5DKW.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/i6h5DKW.jpg)

Hitting shift (still control main engine)

![WVVjYKz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/WVVjYKz.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T13:39:43Z" title="04/29/2015 01:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Shunt**

The wiki was written a while ago - there were very major differences in how this stuff works between the last version and this one,and the wiki hasn't been updated yet. 

You've written it up pretty well! Would you consider updating the wiki to reflect how things work in 1.0? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T14:27:13Z" title="04/29/2015 02:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by stibbons**
I have tried all sort to work this one out. No matter what you do, you can't change the key bindings in the settings. Unticking trans / rot in the setting reverts after you apply them.
this is happening for me too, what the hell is going on , i love docking mode ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
I'm getting this too. Hitting spacebar to swap between rotation and translation does not change the mapping for any key. It is as if docking mode itself was not enabled except for spacebar.

Can you guys try deleting your current settings.cfg files please, also when changing key modes in the settings screen, actually rebind the key as well at the same time, it seems it won't "take" unless you rebind (using the same key as before is fine)

Not sure if this is Windows only but for me on Linux at least I'm not getting this issue, and docking mode is operating normally.

This "bug" was desribed in the thread "Impossible to use thrusters in docking mode?!" as well. Luckily sal\_vager's solution works, thank you! I'm glad I can use docking again ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif).
Deleting settings.cfg worked for me. The default for translate up/down and forward/backward seems to have swapped, but that can be changed in the keybindings.

> 
> Can you guys try deleting your current settings.cfg files please, also when changing key modes in the settings screen, actually rebind the key as well at the same time, it seems it won't "take" unless you rebind (using the same key as before is fine)

> 
> Deleting settings.cfg worked for me.

Yep, worked for me too. Thanks for helping!

> 
> The default for translate up/down and forward/backward seems to have swapped

True. Wiki is wrong here.

By default:

Shift/Control - move forward/backwards

W/S - move down/up

A/D - move left/right
I thought I was going crazy and was trying to find what was wrong with the design of my craft. Thanks for this solution!
